lead_paragraph: While the men's basketball team's first order of business is to win the gold medal at the Rio Games there will be some other basketball business taking place on the court.

headline.main: Olympics Provide Unique Opportunities for Sneaker Companies
headline.print_headline: Olympics Provide Unique Opportunities for Sneaker Companies
